From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: generation and génération

German

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /ˌɡeːnəʁaˈt͡si̯oːn/, [ˌɡeːnəʁaˈt͡sjoːn] (standard)
  • IPA(key): /ˌɡɛnə-/ (variant in common speech)
  • Audio (Germany (Berlin)):(file)

Noun

[edit]

Generation f (genitive Generation, plural Generationen)

  1. generation

Declension

[edit]
Declension of Generation [feminine]
singular plural
indef. def. noun def. noun
nominative eine die Generation die Generationen
genitive einer der Generation der Generationen
dative einer der Generation den Generationen
accusative eine die Generation die Generationen
